net.theblackchamber.crypto.util

Class SecurePropertiesUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.theblackchamber.crypto.util.SecurePropertiesUtils

  • public class SecurePropertiesUtils
extends Object
    Utility class to provide an easy way to take a clear text properties file and encrypt it.
    Author:
    sminogue

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SecurePropertiesUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SecureProperties encryptPropertiesFile(File clearProperties)
      Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.
      NOTE: The encryption related properties need to be properly set prior to using this.
      static SecureProperties encryptPropertiesFile(File clearProperties, String keyPath, String keyPass, String keyEntry)
      Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.
      Note: Encryption fields passed as parameters WILL NOT be placed into the resulting SecureProperties file.
      static SecureProperties encryptPropertiesFile(File clearProperties, String keyPath, String keyPass, String keyEntry, boolean retainCrytoConfigProperties)
      Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SecurePropertiesUtils

        public SecurePropertiesUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • encryptPropertiesFile

        public static SecureProperties encryptPropertiesFile(File clearProperties)
                                              throws FileNotFoundException,
                                                     IOException,
                                                     KeyStoreException
        Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.
        NOTE: The encryption related properties need to be properly set prior to using this. entry-name, key-path, keystore-password
        Parameters:
        clearProperties - Un-encrypted properties file to be secured
        Returns:
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Properties file not found on disk.
        IOException - Error reading/writing From the clear properties or to the secure properties
        KeyStoreException - Error accessing or using the keystore.

      • encryptPropertiesFile

        public static SecureProperties encryptPropertiesFile(File clearProperties,
                                     String keyPath,
                                     String keyPass,
                                     String keyEntry)
                                              throws FileNotFoundException,
                                                     IOException,
                                                     KeyStoreException
        Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.
        Note: Encryption fields passed as parameters WILL NOT be placed into the resulting SecureProperties file.
        Parameters:
        clearProperties - Un-encrypted properties file to be secured
        keyPath - Path to the keystore file.
        keyPass - Password to be used to open and secure the Keystore password.
        keyEntry - Entry name of the key to use from the keystore.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Properties file not found on disk.
        IOException - Error reading/writing From the clear properties or to the secure properties
        KeyStoreException - Error accessing or using the keystore.

      • encryptPropertiesFile

        public static SecureProperties encryptPropertiesFile(File clearProperties,
                                     String keyPath,
                                     String keyPass,
                                     String keyEntry,
                                     boolean retainCrytoConfigProperties)
                                              throws FileNotFoundException,
                                                     IOException,
                                                     KeyStoreException
        Utility which will take an existing Properties file on disk and replace any -unencrypted values with encrypted.
        Parameters:
        clearProperties - Un-encrypted properties file to be secured
        keyPath - Path to the keystore file.
        keyPass - Password to be used to open and secure the Keystore password.
        keyEntry - Entry name of the key to use from the keystore.
        retainCrytoConfigProperties - Boolean to indicate if the encryption field parameters should be stored in the resulting SecureProperties file. True they will be, False they wont.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Properties file not found on disk.
        IOException - Error reading/writing From the clear properties or to the secure properties
        KeyStoreException - Error accessing or using the keystore.
